page.syntax: $u.s.pad(str as string, padLength as number, padString as string [, position as string])

argument.name: padString
argument.description: The character to used to pad the string.

argument.name: position
argument.description: (Optional) Defines where padding should be applied - left, right, or both sides. This property can be one of the following values:

item.name: l
item.description: Apply the padding to the beginning (left) of the string.

item.name: r
item.description: Apply the padding to the end (right) of the string

item.name: c
item.description: Apply padding equally to both sides (center) of the string.

description.p: Pad a string with a passed in padding string. Optionally choose where the padding should be positioned.
